TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PipeAuditRule extends System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule
Public NotInheritable Class PipeAuditRule Inherits AuditRule

summary.span: 表示访问控制项 (ACE) 的抽象，该访问控制项定义了管道的审核规则。

span.span: Represents an abstraction of an access control entry (ACE) that defines an audit rule for a pipe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 审核规则确定何时以及如何记录对系统对象执行的操作。Audit rules determine when and how actions performed on system objects are logged. 类表示 (ACE) 的基础访问控制项的抽象，此类指定用户帐户、提供 (读) 写权限的访问类型，以及是否执行审核。The class represents an abstraction of an underlying access control entry (ACE) that specifies a user account, the type of access to provide (read, write, and so on), and whether to perform auditing. 此类可以指定如何从对象继承和传播审核规则。This class can specify how audit rules are inherited from and propagated to objects. 若要允许在运行 Windows NT 或更高版本操作系统的计算机上进行文件审核，必须启用审核访问安全策略;默认情况下，此策略设置为 " **无审核**"。To allow file auditing on computers that are running Windows NT or later operating systems, the Audit Access Security policy must be enabled; by default, this policy is set to **No Auditing**. 若要启用审核访问安全策略，请执行以下步骤：To enable the Audit Access Security policy, perform the following steps: 1. 单击 " **启动** " 按钮，然后指向 " **所有程序**"。Click the **Start** button and then point to **All Programs**. 指向 " **管理工具** "，然后单击 " **本地安全策略**"。Point to **Administrative Tools** and then click **Local Security Policy**. 2. 在 "本地安全设置" 窗口中，展开 "本地策略" 文件夹，然后单击 "审核策略" 文件夹。In the Local Security Settings window, expand the Local Policies folder and left-click the Audit Policy folder. 3. 在 "本地安全设置" 窗口的右窗格中，双击 " **审核对象访问** " 项以显示 " **审核对象访问属性** " 对话框。Double-click the **Audit object access** entry in the right pane of the Local Security Settings window to display the **Audit object access Properties** dialog box. 4. 选择 " **成功** " 或 " **失败** " 框以记录成功或失败。Select the **Success** or **Failure** boxes to log successes or failures. 请注意，用户帐户的审核规则需要对同一用户帐户具有相应的访问规则。Note that an audit rule for a user account requires a corresponding access rule for the same user account. 使用 类创建新的审核规则。Use the class to create a new audit rule. 可以使用类来持久保存此规则 。You can persist this rule using the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.name: identity
param.span: 封装对用户帐户的引用的 对象。

span.span: An object that encapsulates a reference to a user account.

param.name: rights
param.span: 值之一，该值指定与访问规则关联的操作的类型。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule.

param.name: flags
param.span: 值之一，该值指定何时执行审核。

span.span: One of the values that specifies when to perform auditing.

summary.span: 为 对象中指定的用户帐户初始化 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for a user account specified in a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建可使用类保存的审核规则 。Use this constructor to create an audit rule that can be persisted using the class. 审核规则确定何时以及如何记录对系统对象执行的操作。Audit rules determine when and how actions performed on system objects are logged.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建可使用类保存的审核规则 。Use this constructor to create an audit rule that can be persisted using the class. 审核规则确定何时以及如何记录对系统对象执行的操作。Audit rules determine when and how actions performed on system objects are logged.
